name: In The Dark (itch) (Turtled)
description:
Reach the end of the levels before either your light source runs out or you're overwhelmed by monsters. Don't feel bad if you can't beat the later levels, I made them nearly impossible on purpose because I didn't have time to make a lot of levels so I just made the ones near the end harder as to make the game last longer. IF IT ONLY SHOWS A BLACK SCREEN WHILE RUNNING ON CHROME EITHER FOLLOW THESE STEPS TO GET IT WORKING CORRECTLY OR SIMPLY DOWNLOAD THE EXECUTABLE FILE BELOW.

To get the browser player working if you're running Chrome and it's only showing a blank screen, follow these steps:

  1. Go to Chrome settings.
  2. Click the Advanced drop down at the bottom of the page.
  3. Under the 'System' tab, enable "Use hardware acceleration when available."
  4. Hit the 'relaunch' button to relaunch.
  1. Next, type or copy/paste in chrome://flags/ into the search bar and hit enter.
  2. Search for "WebGL"
  3. Locate and enable the setting "WebGL Draft Extensions".
  4. Hit the 'relaunch' button again.

The web player should now work on Chrome for you!
